segments.source_content:
---
id: introduction
description: Docusaurus uses MDX. Find out more about Docusaurus-specific features when writing Markdown.
slug: /markdown-features
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Markdown Features

translations.zh-hant: # Markdown 功能

segments.source_content: import BrowserWindow from '@site/src/components/BrowserWindow';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_623f74e7

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses **[Markdown](https://commonmark.org/)** as its main content authoring format.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用 **[Markdown](https://commonmark.org/)** 作為其主要內容撰寫格式。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Learn Markdown]

You can [learn Markdown in 10 minutes](https://commonmark.org/help/).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[學習 Markdown]

你可以[在 10 分鐘內學會 Markdown](https://commonmark.org/help/)。

:::

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses modern tooling to help you create **interactive documentation**.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用現代工具幫助你建立**互動式文檔**。

segments.source_content: The **[MDX](https://mdxjs.com/)** compiler transforms **Markdown files to React components**, and allows you to use JSX in your Markdown content. This enables you to easily interleave React components within your content, and create delightful learning experiences.

translations.zh-hant: **[MDX](https://mdxjs.com/)** 編譯器將 **Markdown 文件轉換為 React 組件**，並允許你在 Markdown 內容中使用 JSX。這讓你能輕鬆地在內容中穿插 React 組件，創造愉悅的學習體驗。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Use the MDX Playground]

The **[MDX playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)** is your new best friend!

It is a very helpful debugging tool that shows how the MDX compiler transforms Markdown to React.

**Options**: select the right format (MDX or CommonMark) and the following plugins Docusaurus uses: `remark-gfm`, `remark-directive`, `rehype-raw`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[使用 MDX 遊樂場]

**[MDX 遊樂場](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)** 是你最好的新朋友！

這是一個非常有用的除錯工具，能展示 MDX 編譯器如何將 Markdown 轉換為 React。

**選項**：選擇正確的格式（MDX 或 CommonMark）以及 Docusaurus 使用的以下插件：`remark-gfm`、`remark-directive`、`rehype-raw`。

:::

segments.source_content: ## MDX vs. CommonMark {#mdx-vs-commonmark}

translations.zh-hant: ## MDX 與 CommonMark 的比較 {#mdx-vs-commonmark}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus compiles both `.md` and `.mdx` files to React components using the MDX compiler, but **the syntax can be interpreted differently** depending on your settings.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用 MDX 編譯器將 `.md` 和 `.mdx` 文件編譯為 React 組件，但**語法的解釋方式可能因設置而異**。

segments.source_content: The MDX compiler supports [2 formats](https://mdxjs.com/packages/mdx/#optionsformat):

translations.zh-hant: MDX 編譯器支援 [2 種格式](https://mdxjs.com/packages/mdx/#optionsformat)：

segments.source_content:
- The [MDX format](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/): a powerful parser allowing the usage of JSX
- The [CommonMark format](https://commonmark.org/): a standard-compliant Markdown parser that does not allow the usage of JSX

translations.zh-hant:
- [MDX 格式](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/)：一個強大的解析器，允許使用 JSX
- [CommonMark 格式](https://commonmark.org/)：一個標準合規的 Markdown 解析器，不允許使用 JSX

segments.source_content: By default, **Docusaurus v3 uses the MDX format for all files** (including `.md` files) for historical reasons.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，**Docusaurus v3 對所有文件（包括 `.md` 文件）使用 MDX 格式**，這是出於歷史原因。

segments.source_content: It is possible to **opt-in for CommonMark** using the [`siteConfig.markdown.format`](../../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown) setting or the `mdx.format: md` front matter.

translations.zh-hant: 你可以透過 [`siteConfig.markdown.format`](../../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown) 設置或 `mdx.format: md` 前置元數據**選擇使用 CommonMark**。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[how to use CommonMark]

If you plan to use CommonMark, we recommend the [`siteConfig.markdown.format: 'detect'`](../../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown) setting. The appropriate format will be selected automatically, based on file extensions:

- `.md` files will use the CommonMark format
- `.mdx` files will use the MDX format

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[如何使用 CommonMark]

如果你計劃使用 CommonMark，我們推薦 [`siteConfig.markdown.format: 'detect'`](../../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown) 設置。系統會根據文件擴展名自動選擇合適的格式：

- `.md` 文件將使用 CommonMark 格式
- `.mdx` 文件將使用 MDX 格式

:::

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Experimental CommonMark support]

The CommonMark support is **experimental** and currently has a few [limitations](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/9092).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::danger[實驗性 CommonMark 支援]

CommonMark 支援目前是**實驗性**功能，並且有一些[限制](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/9092)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Standard features {#standard-features}

translations.zh-hant: ## 標準功能 {#standard-features}

segments.source_content: Markdown is a syntax that enables you to write formatted content in a readable syntax.

translations.zh-hant: Markdown 是一種語法，讓你能以易讀的格式撰寫格式化內容。

segments.source_content:
```md
### My Doc Section

Hello world message with some **bold** text, some _italic_ text, and a [link](/)

![img alt](/img/docusaurus.png)
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_7a577a50

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block

My Doc Section

Hello world message with some **bold** text, some _italic_ text and a [link](/) ![img alt](/img/docusaurus.png) ```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_bc137a19

segments.source_content: Markdown is declarative Some may assume a 1-1 correlation between Markdown and HTML, e.g., `![Preview](/img/docusaurus.png)` will always become ``, as-is. However, _that is not the case_. The Markdown syntax `![message](url)` only declaratively tells Docusaurus that an image needs to be inserted here, but we may do other things like transforming a [file path to URL path](./markdown-features-assets.mdx#images), so the generated markup may differ from the output of other Markdown renderers, or a naïve hand-transcription to the equivalent JSX/HTML code. In general, you should only assume the _semantics_ of the markup (` ``` ` fences become [code blocks](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx); `>` becomes [quotes](#quotes), etc.), but not the actual compiled output.

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_057a9dd8

segments.source_content: ## Front matter {#front-matter}

translations.zh-hant: ## 前置元數據 {#front-matter}

segments.source_content: Front matter is used to add metadata to your Markdown file. All content plugins have their own front matter schema, and use the front matter to enrich the default metadata inferred from the content or other configuration.

translations.zh-hant: 前置元數據用於為你的 Markdown 文件添加元數據。所有內容插件都有自己的前置元數據架構，並使用前置元數據來豐富從內容或其他配置推斷出的預設元數據。

segments.source_content: Front matter is provided at the very top of the file, enclosed by three dashes `---`. The content is parsed as [YAML](https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/).

translations.zh-hant: 前置元數據位於文件的頂部，由三個破折號 `---` 包圍。內容以 [YAML](https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/) 格式解析。

segments.source_content:
```md
---
title: My Doc Title
more_data:
  - Can be provided
  - as: objects
    or: arrays
---
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_cae897fb

segments.source_content:
:::info

The API documentation of each official plugin lists the supported attributes:

- [Docs front matter](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#markdown-front-matter)
- [Blog front matter](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#markdown-front-matter)
- [Pages front matter](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-pages.mdx#markdown-front-matter)

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

每個官方插件的 API 文檔列出了支援的屬性：

- [文檔前置元數據](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#markdown-front-matter)
- [部落格前置元數據](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#markdown-front-matter)
- [頁面前置元數據](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-pages.mdx#markdown-front-matter)

:::

segments.source_content: ## Quotes {#quotes}

translations.zh-hant: ## 引用 {#quotes}

segments.source_content: Markdown quotes are beautifully styled:

translations.zh-hant: Markdown 引用擁有精美的樣式：

segments.source_content:
```md
> Easy to maintain open source documentation websites.
>
> — Docusaurus
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_71779666

segments.source_content:
<BrowserWindow>

> Easy to maintain open source documentation websites.
>
> — Docusaurus

</BrowserWindow>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_623fa941

segments.source_content: ## Details {#details}

translations.zh-hant: ## 詳情區塊 {#details}

segments.source_content: Markdown can embed HTML elements, and [`details`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/details) HTML elements are beautifully styled:

translations.zh-hant: Markdown 可以嵌入 HTML 元素，而 [`details`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/details) HTML 元素會被賦予精美的樣式：

segments.source_content:
````md
### Details element example

<details>
  <summary>Toggle me!</summary>

  This is the detailed content

  ```js
  console.log("Markdown features including the code block are available");
  ```

  You can use Markdown here including **bold** and _italic_ text, and [inline link](https://docusaurus.io)
  <details>
    <summary>Nested toggle! Some surprise inside...</summary>

    😲😲😲😲😲
  </details>
</details>
````

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_44ecd2e3

segments.source_content:
````mdx-code-block

Details element example

Toggle me! This is the detailed content ```js console.log("Markdown features including the code block are available"); ``` You can use Markdown here including **bold** and _italic_ text, and [inline link](https://docusaurus.io)
Nested toggle! Some surprise inside... 😲😲😲😲😲
````

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_cf50de8a

segments.source_content:
:::info You may want to keep your `` on a single line. Keep in mind that [MDX creates extra HTML `

` paragraphs for line breaks.](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v2/#jsx). When in doubt, use the [MDX playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/) to troubleshoot `

` rendering problems. :::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info 你可能會希望將 `` 保持在同一行。請注意 [MDX 會為換行符號建立額外的 HTML `

` 段落](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v2/#jsx)。如有疑問，可使用 [MDX 遊樂場](https://mdxjs.com/playground/) 來排查 `

` 的渲染問題。 :::
